data.title: Erc aces visit famous Nicosia landmarks
data.meta_description: Five star drivers from the FIA European Rally Championship took a trip to the old part of Nicosia this morning for a visit of two city landmarks.
data.text:
ByERC

Published 19/09/2014 at 09:57 GMT

Five star drivers from the FIA European Rally Championship took a trip to the old part of Nicosia this morning for a visit of two city landmarks.

Eurosport

Image credit: Eurosport

Zoltán Bessenyey, Craig Breen, Robert Consani, Martin Hudec and Kajetan Kajetanowicz visited the Famagusta Gate and Nicosia’s Liberty Monument as they took a few moments out of their preparations for the CNP Asfalistiki Cyprus Rally, which gets underway in the Cypriot capital at 17:20hrs local time today (Friday).

Famagusta Gate is the largest of three gates in the walls of Nicosia and was built in 1567 by the Venetians. The Liberty Monument was erected in 1973 in memory of Greek Cypriot prisoners.
